message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its worth, I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000. I'm open to discussing this further. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I think $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective on the price. While $9,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $12,500. This reflects the true value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $12,500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in the middle?
